features: Lasting comfort: With an adjustable elastic waistband, soft seams and 4-way stretch, this short is really comfy. The inner liner minimizes chafing
Lightweight performance: The light fabric is easy to wear, however far or fast you go
Outdoor versatility: The design and length are ideal for any kind of running, from track to trail and back
1 front pocket: A close, accessible pocket on the front of the garment
4 Way stretch: The fabric stretches in all 4 directions with the support of elastic yarns
Inner brief: A brief integrated in your short/skirt, to avoid chafing and keep your short in place
